data.text: I naxa kɔntɔfili mixi ɲaaxie ra.
E lisima nɛ mafuren alɔ ɲooge,
I xa i taxu Alatala ra, i xa fe fanyi rabatu.
Alatala xa findi i waxɔnfe ra.
I i xaxili ti Alatala ra, a birin taxu a ra.
Ala fama i xa nɔndi makɛnɛnde
I bɔɲɛ raxara Alatala ya i,
I naxa xɔnɔ, i i bɔɲɛ magoro.
Ala fama mixi ɲaaxie raɲɔnde,
A mu buma mixi ɲaaxie xa lɔɛ duniɲa ma.
Naxee bɔɲɛe magoroxi,
Tinxintare tinxintɔɛ yanfama, a xɔnɔ a ma.
Kɔnɔ Marigi yelema na mixi ɲaaxi ma,
Mixi ɲaaxie santidɛgɛma bama a tɛɛ i,
Kɔnɔ e tan nan fama faxade e yɛtɛ xa santidɛgɛma saabui ra.
Se xuri naxan na tinxintɔɛ yi ra,
barima Alatala e sɛnbɛ kanama nɛ,
Alatala ɲɛngi saxi mixi fanyi xɔn.
E mu yaagima tɔɔrɛ tɛmui, e lugama nɛ kaamɛ waxati.
Kɔnɔ mixi ɲaaxie faxama nɛ.
Mixi ɲaaxi doni tongoma nɛ, kɔnɔ e mu a fima.
Alatala xa barakatɔɛe yi bɔxi sɔtɔma nɛ kɛ ra,
Naxan ɲɛrɛ ki rafan Alatala ma,
Hali a sa dinkon, a mu birama,
Kabi n dimɛdi tɛmui, han n xɛmɔxi ra,
Tinxintɔɛ ki tima, a mixie donima.
I xa fe kobi lu na, i xa fe fanyi raba.
Sɛriyɛ rafan Alatala ma.
Tinxintɔɛe fama nɛ yi bɔxi sɔtɔde kɛ ra, e lu be abadan.
Tinxintɔɛ lɔnni nan masenma,
A Marigi Ala xa sɛriyɛ na a bɔɲɛ kui,
Mixi ɲaaxi tinxintɔɛ yanfama, a xa a faxa.
Kɔnɔ Alatala mu tinxintɔɛ luma a yaxuie sagoe.
I xaxili ti Alatala ra, a xa kira suxu,
Tɛmui dangixi n bara sɛnbɛma ɲaaxi nde to.
Kɔnɔ n to dangi a yire a firin nde,
I xa mixi fanyi nan mato, tinxintɔɛ nan igbɛ.
Kɔnɔ yunubitɔɛe tan fama nɛ sɔntɔde,
Alatala tinxintɔɛe rakisima nɛ,
A e malima nɛ, a e ratanga.
